mapper.select: SELECT *, COUNT(*) OVER() totalRowCount FROM pb2_pcm_req_committee_hdr WHERE pcm_req_id=#{masterId} ORDER BY id

select r.id, h.committee, h.committee_id, d.position, case when d.employee_code='' then title else coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'res.partner.title,name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.title_id), t.name) end as title , case when d.employee_code='' then d.first_name else coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'hr.employee,first_name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.id), d.first_name) end as first_name , case when d.employee_code='' then d.last_name else coalesce((select value from pb2_ext_ir_translation where name = 'hr.employee,last_name' and type = 'model' and lang='th_TH' and res_id = e.id), d.last_name) end as last_name from pb2_pcm_req_committee_dtl d left join pb2_pcm_req_committee_hdr h on h.id = d.master_id left join pb2_pcm_req r on r.id = h.pcm_req_id left join pb2_ext_pr_method_view m on r.prweb_method_id = m.id left join pb2_ext_hr_employee e on d.employee_code = e.employee_code left join pb2_ext_res_partner_title t on e.title_id = t.id where r.id = #{id} order by h.committee,d.id
